languages.text: Едва оказавшись на планете, группа высадки отчитывается по вокс-связи. Лежащий перед ними исполинский корабль покрыт шипами и выглядит словно мрачное чудовище, слепленное из самой тьмы и грозно нависающее над ущельем. Умудренный опытом ветеран безошибочно определяет природу богопротивного судна — творение ксенорасы друкари. Готовый рухнуть в любой момент, корабль издает протяжный, похожий на вой скрип. Словно предупреждает, что утянет за собой всякого, кто решится проникнуть внутрь.

traits.locale_text: Едва оказавшись на планете, группа высадки отчитывается по вокс-связи. Лежащий перед ними исполинский корабль покрыт шипами и выглядит словно мрачное чудовище, слепленное из самой тьмы и грозно нависающее над ущельем. Умудренный опытом ветеран безошибочно определяет природу богопротивного судна — творение ксенорасы друкари. Готовый рухнуть в любой момент, корабль издает протяжный, похожий на вой скрип. Словно предупреждает, что утянет за собой всякого, кто решится проникнуть внутрь.

languages.text: The landing party reports via vox as soon as they touch down. The colossal voidship before them is covered with spikes. It resembles a morbid beast sculpted from darkness itself, menacingly hanging over the ravine. An experienced veteran accurately determines the origin of the unholy vessel — it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari. Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along into the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.
languages.original_text: Едва оказавшись на планете, группа высадки отчитывается по вокс-связи. Лежащий перед ними исполинский корабль покрыт шипами и выглядит словно мрачное чудовище, слепленное из самой тьмы и грозно нависающее над ущельем. Умудренный опытом ветеран безошибочно определяет природу богопротивного судна — творение ксенорасы друкари. Готовый рухнуть в любой момент, корабль издает протяжный, похожий на вой скрип. Словно предупреждает, что утянет за собой всякого, кто решится проникнуть внутрь.

traits.locale_text: The landing party reports via vox as soon as they touch down. The colossal voidship before them is covered with spikes and looks like a morbid beast sculpted out of darkness, menacingly hanging over the ravine. An experienced veteran accurately determines the origin of the unholy vessel — it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari. Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along to the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.

Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along into the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.

It resembles a morbid beast sculpted from darkness itself, menacingly hanging over the ravine. An experienced veteran accurately determines the origin of the unholy vessel — it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari. Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along into the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.

The landing party reports via vox as soon as they touch down. The colossal voidship before them is covered with spikes. It resembles a morbid beast sculpted from darkness itself, menacingly hanging over the ravine. An experienced veteran accurately determines the origin of the unholy vessel — it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari. Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along into the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.

languages.text: 探索队着陆之后，立刻通过音阵装置发回了报告。他们发现，这艘巨大的虚空舰内部满是尖刺，宛如从黑暗本身之中雕刻出来的恐怖怪物，张牙舞爪地悬在峡谷上方。一位经验丰富的老兵准确地判断出这艘邪恶舰船的起源，这艘船属于被称为“黑暗灵族”的异形。这艘虚空船已经濒临坍塌，它发出一声悠长而凄厉的嘎吱声，仿佛要把任何胆敢打扰它沉睡的人拖进深渊。
languages.original_text: The landing party reports via vox as soon as they touch down. The colossal voidship before them is covered with spikes. It resembles a morbid beast sculpted from darkness itself, menacingly hanging over the ravine. An experienced veteran accurately determines the origin of the unholy vessel — it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari. Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along into the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.

traits.locale_text: 探索队着陆之后，立刻通过音阵装置发回了报告。他们发现，这艘巨大的虚空舰内部满是尖刺，宛如从黑暗本身之中雕刻出来的恐怖怪物，张牙舞爪地悬在峡谷上方。一位经验丰富的老兵准确地判断出这艘邪恶舰船的起源，这艘船属于被称为“黑暗灵族”的异形。这艘虚空船已经濒临坍塌，它发出一声悠长而凄厉的嘎吱声，仿佛要把任何胆敢打扰它沉睡的人拖进深渊。

languages.text: 上陸部隊は着陸後すぐにヴォクスで報告する。目の前の巨大なヴォイドシップはトゲで覆われている。それは、闇そのものから造形された恐ろしい獣のようで、威嚇するかのように渓谷からぶら下がっている。経験豊富な古参が恐ろしい船の出所を的確に判断する。デュカーリと呼ばれる異種族のものだ。今にも倒れそうなヴォイドシップは、その眠りを妨げようとする者を奈落の底に引きずり込むかのように、長く悲痛な軋みを響かせる。
languages.original_text: The landing party reports via vox as soon as they touch down. The colossal voidship before them is covered with spikes. It resembles a morbid beast sculpted from darkness itself, menacingly hanging over the ravine. An experienced veteran accurately determines the origin of the unholy vessel — it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari. Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along into the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.

traits.locale_text: 上陸部隊は着陸後すぐにヴォクスで報告する。目の前の巨大なヴォイドシップはトゲで覆われている。それは、闇そのものから造形された恐ろしい獣のようで、威嚇するかのように渓谷からぶら下がっている。経験豊富な古参が恐ろしい船の出所を的確に判断する。デュカーリと呼ばれる異種族のものだ。今にも倒れそうなヴォイドシップは、その眠りを妨げようとする者を奈落の底に引きずり込むかのように、長く悲痛な軋みを響かせる。

languages.text: El grupo de aterrizaje informa por voco en cuanto aterrizan. La colosal nave está cubierta de pinchos. Se asemeja a una bestia monstruosa esculpida en la oscuridad misma, que se eleva amenazante sobre el barranco. Un veterano experimentado determina con precisión el origen de la impía nave: pertenece a la raza xenos llamada Drukhari. Preparada para derrumbarse en cualquier momento, la nave del vacío emite un largo y lastimero crujido como si prometiera arrastrar al abismo a cualquiera que se atreva a perturbar su sueño.
languages.original_text: The landing party reports via vox as soon as they touch down. The colossal voidship before them is covered with spikes. It resembles a morbid beast sculpted from darkness itself, menacingly hanging over the ravine. An experienced veteran accurately determines the origin of the unholy vessel — it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari. Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along into the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.

traits.locale_text: El grupo de aterrizaje informa por voco en cuanto aterrizan. La colosal nave está cubierta de pinchos. Se asemeja a una bestia monstruosa esculpida en la oscuridad misma, que se eleva amenazante sobre el barranco. Un veterano experimentado determina con precisión el origen de la impía nave: pertenece a la raza xenos llamada Drukhari. Preparada para derrumbarse en cualquier momento, la nave del vacío emite un largo y lastimero crujido como si prometiera arrastrar al abismo a cualquiera que se atreva a perturbar su sueño.

languages.text: Der Landetrupp meldet sich via Vox, sobald er am Boden ist. Das riesige Raumschiff vor deinen Männern ist mit Stacheln bedeckt. Es ähnelt einem morbiden Monster, das aus der Dunkelheit selbst erschaffen wurde und bedrohlich über der Schlucht hängt. Ein erfahrener Veteran weiß, woher dieses unheilige Schiff kommt — es gehört der Xenos-Spezies der Drukhari. Das Raumschiff könnte jeden Augenblick zusammenbrechen. Es stößt ein wehmütiges, langgezogenes Knarzen aus, als würde es versprechen, jeden mit in den Abgrund zu ziehen, der es wagt, seinen Schlaf zu stören.
languages.original_text: The landing party reports via vox as soon as they touch down. The colossal voidship before them is covered with spikes. It resembles a morbid beast sculpted from darkness itself, menacingly hanging over the ravine. An experienced veteran accurately determines the origin of the unholy vessel — it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari. Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along into the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.

traits.locale_text: Der Landetrupp meldet sich via Vox, sobald er am Boden ist. Das riesige Raumschiff vor deinen Männern ist mit Stacheln bedeckt. Es ähnelt einem morbiden Monster, das aus der Dunkelheit selbst erschaffen wurde und bedrohlich über der Schlucht hängt. Ein erfahrener Veteran weiß, woher dieses unheilige Schiff kommt — es gehört der Xenos-Spezies der Drukhari. Das Raumschiff könnte jeden Augenblick zusammenbrechen. languages.text: L'équipe au sol fait son rapport dès l'atterrissage. Le vaisseau colossal qui se trouve devant eux est hérissé de pointes et ressemble étrangement à une bête moribonde façonnée dans les ténèbres elles-mêmes, menaçant de tomber dans le précipice d'un instant à l'autre. Un vétéran expérimenté en identifie aussitôt l'origine : l'appareil appartient à une race de xénos appelés Drukharis. Prêt à basculer à tout moment, il émet un long craquement sinistre, telle une funeste promesse d'emporter dans l'abîme quiconque osera troubler son sommeil.
languages.original_text: The landing party reports via vox as soon as they touch down. The colossal voidship before them is covered with spikes. It resembles a morbid beast sculpted from darkness itself, menacingly hanging over the ravine. An experienced veteran accurately determines the origin of the unholy vessel — it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari. Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along into the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.

languages.text: İniş ekibi, yere iner inmez voks aracılığıyla rapor veriyor. Önlerindeki devasa uçsuz gemisi, dikenlerle kaplı duruyor. Karanlığın kendisinden olma, hastalıklı bir yaratığı andırarak vadinin üzerinde tehditkârca asılı duruyor. Kıdemlilerden biri, bu uğursuz geminin kökenini belirlemeyi başarıyor. Gemi, Drukhari denen bir zeno ırkına ait. Her an devrilebilecek olan uçsuz gemisi, onu uykusundan uyandırmaya cüret eden herkesi aşağıdaki uçuruma sürüklemeye söz verircesine uzun, kederli gıcırtılar çıkarıyor.
languages.original_text: The landing party reports via vox as soon as they touch down. The colossal voidship before them is covered with spikes. It resembles a morbid beast sculpted from darkness itself, menacingly hanging over the ravine. An experienced veteran accurately determines the origin of the unholy vessel — it belongs to the xenos race called Drukhari. Ready to collapse at any moment, the voidship emits a long woeful creak as if promising to drag along into the abyss below anyone who dares to disturb its slumber.
